did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 500 items.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Edward Wilson James Papers , Accession #38-402, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Personal and business papers, land grants, deeds and other papers signed by Virginia governors and others, relating to the history of Lower Norfolk and Princess Anne Counties, Va., and the James Family. Includes the wills of Jacob Hunter, Edward James, Elizabeth James, John James, and William James, vestry book of Lynnhave Parish, and List of tithable and taxable property, 1784.

Names represented include John Strode Barbour, Sir William Berkeley, Baron de Botetourt, Robert Dinwiddie, John Ffloy, Sir William Gooch, Sir john Harvey, Patrick Henry, Thomas Jefferson, Henry Lee, James Madison, John Page, Beverley Randolph, Edmund Randolph, John West, William Wirt, and James Wood.
